question: Which viral disease can be treated with EDP-938?
ideal_answer: Respiratory Syncytial Virus can be treated with EDP-938.

snippets.text: EDP-938, a Respiratory Syncytial Virus Inhibitor, in a Human Virus Challenge.
EDP-938, a nonfusion replication inhibitor of RSV, acts by modulating the viral nucleoprotein.
EDP-938, a new antiviral with inhibitory activity against the nucleoprotein of the respiratory syncytial virus.
EDP-938 has shown high efficacy against RSV.
EDP-938, a novel nucleoprotein inhibitor of respiratory syncytial virus, demonstrates potent antiviral activities in vitro and in a non-human primate model.
EDP-938 is a novel non-fusion replication inhibitor of respiratory syncytial virus (RSV).
